title: ‘There Were a Few Tears Shed That Day:’ Memories from My Tour De Suisse Career Curtain Call
content:
For most riders, the Tour de Suisse is a time to ramp up for the Tour. For Bobby Julich in 2008, it was a goodbye to professional racing.

Read the full article at ‘There Were a Few Tears Shed That Day:’ Memories from My Tour De Suisse Career Curtain Call on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
